PrecisRegulations amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (COVID-19 - JUNE 7 TO JULY 4, 2020 QUALIFYING PERIOD) in order to provide more support to employers through the Canada Emergency Wage Subsidy for an additional four-week qualifying period.
